pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa bhikkhunupassayaṁ nissāya yavakhettaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.3_0: Bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi khette chaḍḍenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.4_0: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.6_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.7_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.8_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.9_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.12_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.14_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.15.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā saṅkāraṁ vā vighāsaṁ vā harite chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.12_0: calakāni vā aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṁ vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.14_0: pubbaṇṇaṁ aparaṇṇaṁ yaṁ manussānaṁ upabhogaparibhogaṁ ropimaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.19_0: Sakiṁ āṇattā bahukampi chaḍḍeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.1_0: Harite haritasaññā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.2_0: Harite vematikā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.3_0: Harite aharitasaññā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
